summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of First Avenue West; Second Avenue West; Third Avenue West, each from McGraw Street to Ray Street, and Smith Street form First Avenue West to Third Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Majority Petition therefor, being File No. 31573 of the City records of the City Comptroller of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
